title: My Google Pixel XL4 has no camera at this time, a& this impacts the Messages QR Scanner, too. HELP!
content:
I have done a factory reset, among other things, per Google's instruction.  Long story short, I still have no camera, flashlight, and as of this morning, no QR Scanner in the phone's Messages app.  Therefore, I cannot get my Messages for the Web today or until the new motherboard can be installed a week from today. This is awful!
There needs to be an alternative way to get Messages for the Web.
